entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:45AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...More Heavy Rain in the Alaska Range... Another moisture laden weather system is moving across the Interior and Alaska Range with rainfall amounts of 0.50 to 1.0 inch expected today.
